name: Horse Academy Island
description:
Explore a whole new equestrian world, play with your friends or make new ones in a friendly and welcoming community.

Take control and develop your very own ranch in the way you've always wanted to. Breed and train your horses and explore the vast world of Horse Academy whilst making new friends as you go.

◆ Trail ride with new friends and old on a huge multiplayer island. Participate in multiplayer treasure hunts and stop for photography of the scenery and wildlife.

◆ Race in exciting championship events and develop your reputation as a legendary horse trainer.

◆ Breed thousands of different horses, from realistic breeds to breeds from your wildest fantasies, if you’re feeling creative you can even design your own.

◆ More than just racing! Compete in a range of additional events including Barrel Racing, Show Jumping, Cross Country and more!

Starting the game from your first horse and some basic land to develop, you'll develop a world class ranch, compete at all steps of the competition ladder and have many adventures throughout your time as a horse trainer.

A game that’s always evolving, welcome to Horse Academy.
